markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

Seated to one side, Venerable Rādha said to the Buddha:

“Sir, they speak of things being ‘liable to originate’. What is liable to originate?”

“Rādha, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are liable to originate.

Seeing this … They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”

SN.23.22. Nirodhadhammasutta (“Liable To Cease”)
